snippet: Nick Kyrgios was involved in a heated row in his post-match news conference after being questioned about his behaviour during his five-set victory over Dustin Brown at Wimbledon on Friday....
lead_paragraph: Nick Kyrgios was involved in a heated row in his post-match news conference after being questioned about his behaviour during his five-set victory over Dustin Brown at Wimbledon on Friday.

headline.print_headline: Kyrgios Involved in Heated Row With Journalists
headline.main: Kyrgios Involved in Heated Row With Journalists
